RESEARCH BID SHEET
This form is to be used to provide research suppliers job specifications. Use it to communicate specifications verbally and send as follow-up to confirm all specifications in writing to each supplier. After receipt of bids, use internally as a recording device for bid comparisons. Retain this fora as a permanent part of project file.

Project Objective/Design Description
To quantitatively assess the appeal and communication of alternative campaigns for Project UT introductory advertising among 18-24 year old inner city Black competitive smokers.
